item.title: The wolf you feed
item.description: .org-center { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center; } .org-center { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center; } Photo by M. Zonderling on Unsplash It is inevitable that all of us will face difficulties and challenges as we go through our lives. A beloved family member may fall sick, we will fall sick ourselves, we will not make a team that we so desperately wanted to and worked hard for.
